nodes.text: The Nak'tra crystal rifle was a type of blaster rifle. It used a specially modified crystal beamsplitter to increase the power of the shots that it fired, which made it a very deadly weapon.

Nak'tra crystal rifles appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
